member.summary: Encapsulates results from Android SDK Manager's listing

member.summary: Gets or sets the available packages to install.

member.name: T:Cake.AndroidSdkManager.AndroidSdkManagerToolSettings
member.summary: Android SDK Manager tool settings.

member.name: P:Cake.AndroidSdkManager.AndroidSdkManagerToolSettings.SdkRoot
member.summary: Gets or sets the Android SDK root path.

member.name: P:Cake.AndroidSdkManager.AndroidSdkManagerToolSettings.Channel
member.summary: Gets or sets the release channel.

member.name: P:Cake.AndroidSdkManager.AndroidSdkManagerToolSettings.IncludeObsolete
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to include obsoleted packages.
member.value: true if include obsoleted packages; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.AndroidSdkManager.AndroidSdkManagerToolSettings.NoHttps
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether HTTPS should be used.
member.value: true if no HTTPS; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.AndroidSdkManager.AndroidSdkManagerToolSettings.ProxyType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the proxy to be used.

member.name: P:Cake.AndroidSdkManager.AndroidSdkManagerToolSettings.ProxyHost
member.summary: Gets or sets the proxy host.

member.name: P:Cake.AndroidSdkManager.AndroidSdkManagerToolSettings.ProxyPort
member.summary: Gets or sets the proxy port.

member.name: P:Cake.AndroidSdkManager.AndroidSdkManagerToolSettings.SkipVersionCheck
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to skip the sdkmanager version check. By default, the sdkmanager version is checked before each invocation to ensure a new enough version is in use.
member.value: true if skip version check; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Cake.AndroidSdkManager.AndroidSdkManagerProxyType
member.summary: Android SDK Manager proxy type.

member.name: F:Cake.AndroidSdkManager.AndroidSdkManagerProxyType.None
member.summary: Do not use a proxy.

member.name: F:Cake.AndroidSdkManager.AndroidSdkManagerProxyType.Http
member.summary: Use a HTTP proxy.

member.name: F:Cake.AndroidSdkManager.AndroidSdkManagerProxyType.Socks
member.summary: Use a SOCKS proxy.
